title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
### Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush - HX3681/24

**Product Overview:**
Experience the power of sonic technology with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, designed for superior oral care. This sleek, rechargeable toothbrush features advanced cleaning capabilities, making it an excellent choice for those seeking a more efficient and effective brushing experience.

#### Key Features:
- **Model Number:** HX3681/24
- **Type:** Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush
- **Color:** Black
- **Plaque Removal Efficiency:** 3x more plaque removal compared to a manual toothbrush

**Technology & Design:**
- **Sonicare Technology:** Enjoy the benefits of sonic technology with a 2-minute brushing time, equivalent to a month's worth of manual brushing.
- **Slim Ergonomic Design:** The slim and comfortable design is easy to hold, ensuring a gentle yet effective clean.
- **Familiar Shaped Head:** The brush head is designed to fit comfortably in your mouth, providing a familiar and natural brushing experience.

**Features:**
- **QuadPacer:** Optimal time notification for each mouth section, ensuring thorough cleaning.
- **SmarTimer:** 2-minute timer to help you brush for the recommended duration.
- **Pressure Sensor:** Indicator that flashes red to prevent excessive brushing pressure, protecting your gums from recession.
- **Intensity Settings:** Choose from 2 settings to customize your brushing experience.

**Included in the Kit:**
- **Electric Toothbrush:** Philips Sonicare 3100
- **Brush Head:** SimplyClean (C1)
- **USB Charger:** 1 unit (wall adapter not included)

**Benefits:**
- Improved plaque removal and gum health.
- Comfortable and user-friendly design.
- Efficient brushing time that saves you time and effort.
- Versatile intensity settings for personalized care.

**Ideal for:**
- Individuals looking for a more thorough and efficient way to clean their teeth.
- Those concerned about gum health and want to prevent recession.
- Busy lifestyles that require a quick and effective brushing routine.

Don't settle for less when it comes to your oral health. Upgrade to the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush today and experience the difference sonic technology can make!
